Title: Relates to waiving school taxes by a town, city, or county industrial development agency
Summary: Prohibits a town, city, or county industrial development agency from waiving taxes which would be received by a school district.
LawCode: Add ยง889, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to waiving school taxes by a town, city, or county industrial development agency
